channel.title: Create udev Rule
channel.description:
I'm attempting to connect a Trezor to the Electrum wallet built into Whonix.
When I first attempted it notified me that I needed to download the libraries for it to recognize my device. After i did this the device still hasn't shown up and it says "On Linux, you might have to add a new permission to your udev rules."
How can I fix this?

item.title: Create udev Rule
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
1. learn how to resolve it on a Debian host as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle

  2. learn how to resolve it in a Debian VirtualBox VM as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle

  3. only then try proceed doing that inside Whonix

Read full topic

item.title: Create udev Rule

item.description:
I’m attempting to connect a Trezor to the Electrum wallet built into Whonix.

When I first attempted it notified me that I needed to download the libraries for it to recognize my device. After i did this the device still hasn’t shown up and it says “On Linux, you might have to add a new permission to your udev rules.”

How can I fix this?
